body:
#### PR description:
Update warning to add DD4hep in `Configuration/StandardSequences/python/GeometryConf.py`

#### PR validation:
Fake D92, then use the new script.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Not a backport and no need of backport.
title: Add warning to add DD4hep in GeometryConf
